thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au | 8 of 79
thread.title: Simon

author: Simon
title: Simon
text: I've always been reticent to use websites to sell tickets when I can't make it to a gig/show. The official resale site allows me to 'set and forget' managing all the issues you otherwise have to deal with including: legitimacy of tickets, securing funds, etc. The interface is easy to use and perhaps helped by not being greedy on the set price, my tickets sold within half an hour. I'll be utilising again if I can't make it to the gig/show that I've purchased tickets for.
